languages.text:
Ajusta el brillo al nivel elegido.{br}
Asegúrate de poder ver detalles en las zonas oscuras (SOMBRAS), superficies mates (TONOS MEDIOS), y en el fuego y las luces (ILUMINADO).
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

traits.locale_text: Be sure not to lose details by paing attention to the darker areas in SHADOWS, matte surfaces in MIDTONES, and the fire and light sources in BRIGHTS

Ajusta el brillo al nivel elegido.{br}
Asegúrate de poder ver detalles en las zonas oscuras (SOMBRAS), superficies mates (TONOS MEDIOS), y en el fuego y las luces (ILUMINADO).

languages.text:
将亮度调整到您希望的水平。{br}
请确保不要在阴影区域（阴影），哑光表面（中调），或明亮的火焰和光源中（高光）丢失任何细节。
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

traits.locale_text: Be sure not to lose details by paing attention to the darker areas in SHADOWS, matte surfaces in MIDTONES, and the fire and light sources in BRIGHTS

将亮度调整到您希望的水平。{br}
请确保不要在阴影区域（阴影），哑光表面（中调），或明亮的火焰和光源中（高光）丢失任何细节。

languages.text:
Réglez la luminosité sur le niveau souhaité.{br}
Vérifiez que les détails sont bien visibles dans les zones sombres (OMBRES), sur les surfaces mates (DEMI-TEINTES) ou en présence de sources de feu et de lumière vive (REHAUTS).
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

traits.locale_text: Be sure not to lose details by paing attention to the darker areas in SHADOWS, matte surfaces in MIDTONES, and the fire and light sources in BRIGHTS

Réglez la luminosité sur le niveau souhaité.{br}
Vérifiez que les détails sont bien visibles dans les zones sombres (OMBRES), sur les surfaces mates (DEMI-TEINTES) ou en présence de sources de feu et de lumière vive (REHAUTS).

languages.text:
Passe die Helligkeit deinen Bedürfnissen an.{br}
Stelle sicher, dass keine Details in den dunkelsten Bereichen (SCHATTEN), auf matten Oberflächen (MITTELTÖNE) und in hellen Feuer- bzw. Lichtquellen (GLANZLICHTER) verloren gehen.
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

Passe die Helligkeit deinen Bedürfnissen an.{br}
Stelle sicher, dass keine Details in den dunkelsten Bereichen (SCHATTEN), auf matten Oberflächen (MITTELTÖNE) und in hellen Feuer- bzw. Lichtquellen (GLANZLICHTER) verloren gehen.

languages.text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).
languages.original_text:
Позволяет скорректировать яркость до желаемого уровня.{br}
Убедитесь, что большинство деталей остаются видимыми в затемненных областях экрана (ТЕНИ), на матовых поверхностях (ПОЛУТОНА) и в ярко освещенных областях (ЯРКОСТЬ).

traits.locale_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

languages.text:
Позволяет скорректировать яркость до желаемого уровня.{br}
Убедитесь, что большинство деталей остаются видимыми в затемненных областях экрана (ТЕНИ), на матовых поверхностях (ПОЛУТОНА) и в ярко освещенных областях (ЯРКОСТЬ).

好みに合わせて明るさを調整してください。{br}
最も暗い領域（シャドウ）、光沢のない表面（ミッドトーン）、または明るい炎や光源（ハイライト）で詳細を失わないようにしてください。
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).

traits.locale_text:
好みに合わせて明るさを調整してください。{br}
最も暗い領域（シャドウ）、光沢のない表面（ミッドトーン）、または明るい炎や光源（ハイライト）で詳細を失わないようにしてください。

languages.text:
Parlaklığı ayarlayarak istediğin düzeye getir.{br}
Karanlık alanlardaki (GÖLGELER), mat yüzeylerdeki (ORTA TONLAR) veya parlak ateş ve ışık kaynaklarındaki (YÜKSEK IŞIKLAR) ayrıntıların kaybolmadığından emin ol.
languages.original_text:
Adjust the brightness to your desired level.{br}
Make sure not to lose details in the darkest areas (SHADOWS), matte surfaces (MIDTONES), or bright fire and light sources (HIGHLIGHTS).
